title: Siting Criteria for Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Sites
content:
Siting Criteria for Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Sites

State Regulations
§ 382.20 - Scope, purpose and applicability
§ 382.21 - Siting criteria applicable to all disposal methods
§ 382.22 - Additional siting criteria for aboveground and belowground disposal
§ 382.23 - Additional siting criteria for underground mined repositories

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
